TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1216-1217
TEI.2.document_title: Humphrey Jackson to Stephen F. Austin, 09-30-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: Concerning judicial business as alcalde. Case of the Schooner Mary.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1216-1217

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Concerning judicial business as alcalde. Case of the Schooner Mary.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[About *date_mentioned n="09-30-1825">September 30, 1825*/date_mentioned*.]*/p*
*p*Dr. Sir*/p*
*p*I Received yours of the *date_mentioned n="08-29-1825">29th of August*/date_mentioned* Imediately went [and] Valued the Estate of *person_mentioned*Moris Callaham*/person_mentioned* Decd which Amounted to $254.50 *person_mentioned*John K. Harris*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Ezekiel Thomas*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Wilm Vince apprisers*/person_mentioned*. the Land I did not know what to do with so let it alone *person_mentioned*E Thomis*/person_mentioned* swore *person_mentioned*Nicholas Callaham*/person_mentioned* was the *person_mentioned*Brother of Morris Callaham Decd*/person_mentioned* I Gave *person_mentioned*N Callaham*/person_mentioned* up the property he giving *person_mentioned*Wilm Vince*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*E Thomis*/person_mentioned* security for the payment of the Debts and getting a power of Atturny from his *person_mentioned*father */person_mentioned*to Administer to the Estate *person_mentioned*N Callaham*/person_mentioned* applide for time to settle the *person_mentioned*Estate */person_mentioned*as he had to return to his *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* to Settle his Business I gave him Ten Months he promised he would pay all the Debts he could before he went— I would have loocked into this Business sooner but being informed that there was but little due by the *person_mentioned*Estate */person_mentioned*and that *person_mentioned*Moris Callahan*/person_mentioned* Relation was expected here soone I thought it best to wait to he cairn—I Requested of *person_mentioned*John R Harris*/person_mentioned* to let me know if the *person_mentioned*estate */person_mentioned*was a waisting as he lived close by I thought in such cases it was best to wait a short time as persons might settle their own Business—you mentioned in your letter having wrote to me Respecting Boats which I have not Received but *person_mentioned*Capt Harris*/person_mentioned* told me he had received one from you Directed to *person_mentioned*Capt Harris*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Capn Scott*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*T*/person_mentioned* respecting them— there is no boats on this *location_mentioned*River*/location_mentioned* that would answer except one that *person_mentioned*Mr Scott*/person_mentioned* has if hir timbers is sound Hir old planck in intirely worm eaten but if hir timbers is sound Hir old plancked over with good timbers I am not acquainted as I neaver examed them. *person_mentioned*Andres Roach*/person_mentioned* has a boat I think would answer and I am told there is a nother *location_mentioned*on the Trinity*/location_mentioned* I would have went to see them but *person_mentioned*Capt Harris*/person_mentioned* told me he was going there to see them and would let you know if they could be purchased and for what amount— *person_mentioned*Horner*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Dickeson Estate*/person_mentioned* I will pay every attention to that my office requires—There has been a complaint for debt against a Man that has left this *location_mentioned*District*/location_mentioned* and has left some property here and is not expected back for some time. I wish for your oppinion in such cases *person_mentioned*Thomis Earie*/person_mentioned* is charged with tacking Roaps and blocks from on board of the Schooner Marry in *location_mentioned*Galveston bay*/location_mentioned* I bound him over to Trial on the *date_mentioned n="09-10-1825">10th of Septr*/date_mentioned* He Acknowledged having tacking them he being in Distress he said he intended to pay *person_mentioned*Mr. Knight*/person_mentioned* one of the owners for them, as soon as it is tried I will send you the hole of the Records of the case to you for final Judgement— I would have sent you the proceding before now if the distance was not as grait and not being wiling to ad to the Expence already accrued however I might have sent you the Procedings from *location_mentioned*Buflow River*/location_mentioned* the other day had I any paper with me at the time I gave notice to *person_mentioned*T Earle*/person_mentioned* he had a right to taick the proceding in writing and send them to you which he declined—*person_mentioned*Robert Cartwright*/person_mentioned* who acted as *person_mentioned*Constable */person_mentioned*in the Case of *person_mentioned*Jesse H. Cartwright*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Jessy Nelson*/person_mentioned* versus *person_mentioned*Master and Owners of the Schooner Marry*/person_mentioned* has not Returned the Execution nor the procedings there on though I requested him so to do he has Removed ought of this *location_mentioned*District */location_mentioned*to your *location_mentioned*Neighborhood*/location_mentioned* I wish for them as my time of service is all most expired so that all the procedings in the case might be put in order to deliver to my *person_mentioned*successor */person_mentioned*in office*/p*
*p*I feel anxious for my time of service to expire I am complaitly tired of the office for the futur I wish to be no other than a good Citizen—there is some other complaints of petty theft all respecting the Schooner Marry and them that cairn in hir which I rather thinck it would be right to squash if posible the Marry and them that cairn in hir has gaving the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* grait deal of trouble for my part I hait to hear hir name mentioned I wrote to you some time since which I suppose you have not Recd it was respecting a Note that *person_mentioned*Andrew Roach*/person_mentioned* sent for Collection on *person_mentioned*Wm Scott*/person_mentioned* the note was for the payment of a Schooner it called for 200 Dollars if no lawfull *person_mentioned*owner */person_mentioned*appeared for said Schooner by *date_mentioned n="03-xx-1825">march last*/date_mentioned* I then wished for your instructions in the Case *person_mentioned*Mr. Scott*/person_mentioned* has since paid the note as I am informed—Inclosed you have the Sensus of the District*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*HUMPHREY JACKSON*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Cor. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* Principal Judge of *location_mentioned*Austin Colony*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
